metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7152 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found inMicroPython 1.21.0/1.22.0-preview. Affected by this issue is the functionpoll_set_add_fd of the file extmod/modselect.c. The manipulation leads touse after free. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may beused. The patch is identified as 8b24aa36ba978eafc6114b6798b47b7bfecdca26.It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-249158 is theidentifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: giac package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
